nodes.text: Bixon was a male member of the Indobok Pirates. He was a former cook along with the rest of the gang, he was forced to work in a crystal mine after Olag Greck framed the chefs for an attempted poisoning of Boonda the Hutt. After escaping the mine, he and Plixon helped steal the Tharen Wayfarer from the Pitareeze family.
